name: Gary 1

topics.response_text: Gaaaaaaary!{Afraid of dangerous object (like a grenade)}
Um, Um. Gary!?{scared of dangerous object in area (like a grenade)}

conversation.response_text: Ah!  Gary!{Found somebody trespassing, about to attack}
Ah, Gary.{thought he heard something, but nothing's there.}
Huhn?!  Gary!{His enemy has just vanished.  Fearful surprise.}
Haha!  Gary!{Just defeated an enemy.  Proud of Hisself.}
Hunh?  Gary?{Lost track of who he was searching for.}
Haha, Gary!{as in "haha, I found you!"}

description:
Gary 1 is a 45 year-old Caucasian Male.

The original inhabitant of Vault 108 and source of a failed cloning experiment that resulted in 54 increasingly violent clones. By 2277, only these clones remain in the vault, with Gary 1 being the template from which they were all created.

Gary 1's Personality: Violent, psychotic, and extremely hostile toward non-clones. Communicates solely by repeating his name 'Gary' with varying inflections to convey different emotions or intentions.

Gary 1's Backstory: Gary was one of the original inhabitants of Vault 108 who was selected for a grand cloning experiment. The experiment resulted in 54 clones of himself, each exhibiting increasingly violent and psychotic behavior. When the vault scientists attempted to destroy some clones to make room for additional test subjects, the clones violently rebelled, killing the scientists and taking control of the facility. By 2277, Gary and his clones are the sole inhabitants of Vault 108, with the original Gary 1 residing in the cloning lab where the experiment began.
